entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
